description_thought: Extracted from the intro and story sections of the homepage (https://www.vttv.biz/) as they provide a concise overview of the firm's mission and values.
description: VT Technology Ventures is a boutique investment firm focused on supporting early and growth stage technology companies, particularly those where the firm can leverage its experience in building and scaling B2B software solutions. The firm invests in companies rather than just ideas, emphasizing the importance of sweat equity and supporting founder teams who have invested their passion, time, and energy into turning their ideas into viable businesses. The firm's story highlights a belief in leading by example and building true partnerships with entrepreneurs, drawing on its own journey and experiences.
